fields.name: Batting order (Passive):
fields.value: Learn every player that visits you and what abilities were used

fields.name: Cut from the team:
fields.value: Chose a player and an ability. If either that player or that ability targets you, reflect the ability onto the visitor and attack them (if they both target you, double your attack power tonight)

fields.name: Practice Session (1x):
fields.value: Use during evening. Choose a response. Attack them after results.

fields.name: Used to 'Roids (Passive):
fields.value: If your score is less than 50%, increase it by 2/10ths, up to 50%.

fields.name: Serious Demeanor (Passive):
fields.value: You cannot be roleblocked or affected by abilities during the day phase.
